video_prompt: A young anime man walks forward on a wet, striped street. His leather suit subtly reflects light as he moves. Rain specks drift, and his coat shifts with each step. He has a serious expression, and his hair sways. His gloved left hand extends subtly, right hand in pocket.
image_prompt: Anime male character, full body, walking on a wet dark crosswalk. Dark, sophisticated aesthetic with subtle rain. He has fair skin, light blue eyes, and voluminous blonde/white hair. Wearing a gleaming black double-breasted suit, white shirt, black tie, and long coat with blue lining. Black gloves, left hand extended. Reflective surfaces, subtle white rain specks, and general overhead lighting. Cool, confident, mysterious.
refined_video_prompt: An anime man strides forward, his leather suit's surface subtly gleaming and shifting with light. Rain specks drift, making the street's surface subtly glisten and shift in reflection. His coat dynamically ripples and flows with each stride, while his hair sways and drifts. His serious expression maintains its intensity. His gloved left hand subtly extends and retracts with his gait.
